items.title: What is Dastebin?
items.content_text:
Description Dastebin is a service that allows you to paste code snippets in a simple and easy way. This is done by using the IPFS network, that will allow you to store your code snippets in a decentralized way.
Features  Share your code snippets with others Get your code snippets back Show your code snippets raw  Using the Rest API You can post a code snippet with the following command:
